original_title: Sri Lanka’s state-run Litro reduces gas prices
original_body_lines: ECONOMNYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s state-run Litro Gas has decided to reduce prices of cooking gas by 100 rupees effect from Wednesday midnight (03) in line with the reduction in global LP gas prices.
12.5 kg reduced by 100 rupees to 3,638 rupees, from the previous price retailing at 3,738 rupees.
5 kg reduced by 40 rupees to 1,462 rupees, from the previous price retailing at 1,502 rupees.
2.3 kg reduced by 19 rupees to 681 rupees, from the previous price retailing at 700 rupees. (Colombo/May03/2023)
